title: Question About Custom Skins
body: If a custom skin happens to involve some third party program that ruins the game for others, will I get a warning for it, or just get banned? I would like to test out custom skins, I'm just worried about getting banned

replies.body: Custom skins and models sit firmly in a "use-at-your-own-risk" space. Like you mentioned, there's always a chance these files could have other, more malicious programs attached to them. This could harm your own pc, or possibly give you some type of edge in the game that would devalue the team sportsmanship aspect. You can always check out our [**Third Party Program FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848) for more details about these topics.
